Sentencas: We developed environmental-friendly co-sintering processing technology of electrolyte/anode layers in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) using several different types of nano-powders and water-based slurry.
Titulo: Electrolyte Thin Film Formation for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Water-based Slurry Contained Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 Nano-powder

Sentencas: The shrinkages of Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95(CGO) nano-powder for electrolyte and NiO-CGO nano-powder for anode substrate matched each other after the appropriate material selection and the optimization of pre-treatments.
Titulo: Electrolyte Thin Film Formation for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Water-based Slurry Contained Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 Nano-powder

Sentencas: Next, the water-based CGO slurry was developed for electrolyte thin film formation.
Titulo: Electrolyte Thin Film Formation for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Water-based Slurry Contained Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 Nano-powder

Sentencas: By effect of an emulsion type binder and lemon pectin, the water-based CGO slurry which has the both adhesive strength and stability was obtained.
Titulo: Electrolyte Thin Film Formation for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Water-based Slurry Contained Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 Nano-powder

Sentencas: Finally, a dense and thin CGO film was formed on the NiO-CGO anode substrate by co-sintering process at 1400 degrees C, and the prepared film thickness was ca.
Titulo: Electrolyte Thin Film Formation for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Water-based Slurry Contained Ce0.9Gd0.1O1.95 Nano-powder
